venue.name: The Hole in the Wall Theater

item.description:
TWO NOTES:
1) Please call the theatre (see phone number below) and make your own reservations. The first of us there will try to get enough seats together for everybody who responds.
2) If you are available earlier, meet for dinner at Vito's which is just a few doors away. This way we don't have to park, and unpark, and repark. I flipped a coin as the voted were tied, and next time we'll try the other restaurant.
_______________________________________________

"Richard III" at the Hole in the Wall Theater in New Britain
------------------
From the website:

Set in late 1970's London, Shakespeare's classic tragic history
?Richard III? comes to life amid the punk culture of the time.
An exciting and complex tale, this production of ?Richard III?
will challenge what you think you know about King Richard
himself and the epic War of the Roses. God save the King...

http://www.hitw.org/s...

I really like the Hole in the Wall Theater's philosophy...worth reading...tickets are suggested "donations," and once you walk through the door you are a "member:" http://www.hitw.org/p...

more info from website:

For Reservations Call:* If you want to make reservations, go ahead and do so, or you can buy at the theater...
(860) 229-3049

Parking:
Free Parking Available in Garage on Chestnut St.
item.name: Richard III at the Hole in the Wall Theater (& dinner @ 6:00pm)
